page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: In our block there are four farms. Three are dairy farms with some sheep and one is a sheep farm with some cattle.Two of the farming families have farmed here for over a hundred years. All year round the dairy farmers have to milk the cows twice a day.At the end of spring they put fertilizer on to make the hay grow.The cows also go to grass in spring. Hay has to be made in summer time. The farmers have to work quickly and very long hours to get the hay dry and in before it rains.If there is not enough hay they have to buy it. In autumn the farmers have to buy calves so that next year they will have more cows.The cows come back into sheds for the winter time.The old cows have to be sold.Autumn is a quiet time for the farmers.
